revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Pokérus Virus |image = [[File:Pokérus_Virus_Highres.png]] |caption = ''Artwork of the Pokérus Virus''. |use = Allows access to the [[Pokérus]] mechanic and EVs |obtain = Clear [[Distortion World]] (Sinnoh) }} ===Description=== A Virus that gives access to the Pokérus mechanic. ===Acquisition=== Defeat the [[Distortion World]] dungeon. Pokérus is automatically given to your starter Pokémon. ===Effects=== Allows for the use of the [[Pokérus]] mechanic.
